title: spelling mistake in search/package-summary.html#scoring javadocs
description:
http://lucene.apache.org/core/6_4_1/core/org/apache/lucene/search/package-summary.html#scoring and http://lucene.apache.org/core/5_5_4/core/org/apache/lucene/search/package-summary.html#scoring
"Probablistic Models such as Okapi BM25 and DFR" should be "Probabilistic Models such as Okapi BM25 and DFR"

comments.content:
Commit d947f53ef0de8c0b5fef2757f1f6c8d0874df8a4 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Christine Poerschke

LUCENE-7731: fix typo in search/package-summary.html#scoring javadocs. (chillon.m via Christine Poerschke)
